title: TransactionResult
description: A context type representing the result of a transaction initiated via FDC3, which SHOULD be returned as an `IntentResult` by intents that create, retrieve, update or delete content or records in another application. Its purpose is to provide a status and message (where needed) for the transaction and MAY wrap a returned context object.

status.title: Transaction Status
status.description: The status of the transaction being reported.

context.title: Transaction Result Context
context.description: A context object returned by the transaction, possibly with updated data.

message.title: Transaction Message
message.description: A human readable message describing the outcome of the transaction.
